channel.title: Night's Dark Operators - GCOG: The Factory
channel.description:
This session was organised as part of the Gauntlet RPG Community's Open Gaming Weekend (GCOG) (https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/). The team have a lead on a Lisky Bratva human trafficing hub in Hungary so Harry the Black Bagger bugs a bratva car, Azul the Wet Worker beats some info out of a barman, Ameer the Analyst jumps a bratva goon who sadly doesn't recover from a drug's overdose, while Ryan the Sparks hijacks the local cell phone network. Then ... there's a zip-line, innocent civilians, a drone strike and ... 'The Arrival' ...
https://youtu.be/sePTbwsorDU
